Reference:

University graduates face high employment pressure with millions of them swarming into the job markdet every year. On the other hand, the Internet tide is thrusting them to the fore of the era. In China, many young people choose to realize their entrepreneurial dreams by taking advantage of the Internet. Compared with traditional entrepreneurial models, launching an online business needs less money and has easier entry. As long as one is willing to work hard and knows the necessary technology, a good idea has the largest chance of turning into real money. Therefore, the Internet means more opportunities for the those young people who want to start their own business.

Reference:

Leadership. is all about getting people to give their best, helping them to grow their fullest potential, and motivating them to work toward a common goal. Leaders make the right things happen when theyâ€™re supposed to. A good leader, and effective leader is one who has respect for others. A leader who has respec for other people will find that respect is returned. And all concerned will be motivated to work together.

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
